subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France rallied to beat Juan Monaco of Argentina, 4-6, 6-3, 6-2, in the first round of the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France rallied to beat Juan Monaco of Argentina, 4-6, 6-3, 6-2, in the first round of the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco.
